backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing diary entry storage per user principal and a collection of 20 motivational messages (10 mindfulness-focused, 10 life-centric), with methods to add/retrieve entries and fetch all messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the Android download button update in Layout.tsx, linking it to requirement REQ-15 with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 13 frontend files describing the meditation app's routing, UI components, hooks, and styling with calming color palette and breathing exercise functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with meditation-focused design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Calma-Mente app with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining four routes (welcome, home, breathing, diary) wrapped in Layout component with type-safe router setup.
frontend/src/components/DiaryEntryForm.t: Form component with mood selector (8 emoji options) and reflection textarea that submits diary entries to backend via React Query mutation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/DiaryEntryList.t: Scrollable list displaying user's diary entries in reverse chronological order with mood emojis, formatted timestamps, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App layout with header (logo, auth controls), meditation background overlay, main content area, and footer featuring Android Play Store download link, CEO attribution (Matheus Gama), and caffeine.ai credit.
frontend/src/components/MotivationalMess: Reusable card component displaying motivational messages with sparkle icon and refresh button, styled with gradient background and fade-in animation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingTimer.ts: Custom React hook that manages a breathing exercise timer with phases (inhale, hold, exhale) cycling every 4 seconds, providing start/pause/reset controls and cycle count tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and providing login/logout functionality with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching diary entries and motivational messages, and mutating diary entries with automatic cache invalidation using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a calming sage green and lavender color palette, plus keyframe animations for breathing exercise visual effects (breathe-in, breathe-out, breathe-hold).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/BreathingExercisePage: Page component for guided breathing exercises with animated visual cues, phase instructions, and motivational messages displayed after completing breathing cycles.
frontend/src/pages/DiaryPage.tsx: Page component for the mindfulness diary that requires authentication, displaying a login prompt for unauthenticated users or a two-column layout with entry form and entry list for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component displaying a random motivational message and two feature cards linking to breathing exercises and mindfulness diary, with authentication-aware welcome messaging.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Welcome/landing page component that displays the Calma-Mente logo, app description, and three navigation cards (Home, Breathing, Diary) with a call-to-action button to begin.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, custom fonts (Inter), box shadows, border radius variables, and keyframe animations for accordions and fade-in effects.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing 11 implemented features for the Calma-Mente meditation app including welcome screen, breathing exercises, diary with mood tracking, Internet Identity auth, and motivational messages.
